Name: Lost In Maze
About the game: Will you be able to fully explore each maze always bigger and find the key that will get you out? Collect as many gold coins as you can to buy aids in the store that will help you defeat the stronger Slimes at each level. Will you become the best Lost In Maze player? - 20 mazes on 3 levels of difficulty, 60 mazes in total. - Each maze is procedurally generated and of increasing size depending on the level (starting with a 5x5 size) - 5 Slimes types with 3 levels of difficulty (15 various Slimes !) - Steam Achievements - Steam Cloud
